content.rendered: Play through parkour inspired obbys and make your way to the end of the maps! Twist, turn, run and jump your way through large themed worlds – all without falling to your demise. Race to the end, get a high score and earn gold while doing so.Controls:WASD – movementShift – Run (alternately, double tap w)Crouch – C (alternately, Z, | or CAPS LOCK)Chat – T or ENTEROpen Shop – BStart command – /Commands:/rtv – not a fan of this map? Vote to skip it!/players – see the current players in your lobby./xp – See your level and xp./played – See how much time you’ve spent having tons of fun.
